casebody.data:
IN RE SYDNEI V. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 20, 2016

David J. Reich, in support of the petition.

Benjamin M. Wattenmaker, in opposition.

The petition by the respondent mother for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 538, 147 A.3d 147 (2016), is denied.
